title: XCOM Enemy Unknown Update 4-BAT
description:
XCOM: Enemy Unknown Update 4 Cracked (c) 2K Games

Release Date: 1/06/2013 Protection: SteamCEG

Cracked By..: BAT-TEAM # of Files: few

*All previous updates (1 and 3) are required for this release
to work. There is no changelog available for this update but
it was suposed to fix the teleporting aliens bug

XCOM: Enemy Unknown will place you in control of a secret
paramilitary organization called XCOM. As the XCOM commander,
you will defend against a terrifying global alien invasion by
managing resources, advancing technologies, and overseeing
combat strategies and individual unit tactics.

The original XCOM is widely regarded as one of the best games
ever made and has now been re-imagined by the strategy experts
at Firaxis Games. XCOM: Enemy Unknown will expand on that
legacy with an entirely new invasion story, enemies and
technologies to fight aliens and defend Earth.

You will control the fate of the human race through researching
alien technologies, creating and managing a fully operational
base, planning combat missions and controlling soldier movement
in battle

Installation

1. Unpack release
2. Install the update
3. Copy the content from /Crack directory to the
installBinariesWin32 directory of the game,
overwriting the existing files
4. Seed & Enjoy
